original_text: and repays to their face those who hate him, by destroying them. He will not be slack with one who hates him. He will repay him to his face.
korean_text: 그를 미워하는 자에게는 당장에 보응하여 멸하시나니 여호와는 자기를 미워하는 자에게 지체하지 아니하시고 당장에 그에게 보응하시느니라

sentences.original_text: and repays to their face those who hate him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 미워하는 자들에게 그들 앞에서 갚으시며

sentences.original_text: He will repay him to his face
